name: Atlas Prime
description: In bygone ages, mountains were said to house warriors. In this age, the mountain has become the warrior.

abilities.name: Landslide
abilities.description: Bash enemies with an explosive sliding punch, repeat up to three times for a combo attack. Each hit in the three-punch combo increases the radius of the attack. Energy cost is reduced with each hit of Landslide. Install mods on the Landslide Fists to boost stats.

abilities.name: Tectonics
abilities.description: Summon a Bulwark rock-wall, activate again to send the rocks crashing toward the enemy. Bulwarks attacked by enemies release an area-of-effect Slash powered by the Health it has lost.

abilities.name: Petrify
abilities.description: Atlas' hardened gaze will fossilize foes increasing the damage they take, heal Rumblers, and create Petrified Bulwarks. When shattered, petrified enemies drop healing Rubble for Atlas.

abilities.name: Rumblers
abilities.description: Summon two elemental stone brawlers to the melee. Summoning petrifies enemies in close proximity to Atlas. When finished, Rumblers collapse into a pile of healing Rubble.

languages.description: In längst vergangenen Tagen hieß es, dass Gebirge Krieger beherbergten. In diesen Tagen wurde der Berg zum Krieger.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: Au temps jadis, on disait que les montagnes abritaient des guerriers. Aujourd'hui, la montagne est devenue le guerrier.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: In ere passate, si diceva che le montagne custodivano guerrieri. In questa era, la montagna è il guerriero.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: 옛 시대에, 산은 전사들을 품는 요람으로 일컬어지곤 했습니다. 지금 이 시대에서는, 산 그 자체가 전사가 됩니다.
languages.name: 아틀라스 프라임

languages.description: En tiempos antiguos, se decía que las montañas albergaban guerreros. En esta era, la montaña se ha convertido en el guerrero.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: 在往事如烟的时代，据说山脉是战士的容身之所。在这个时代，山脉已化身成战士。
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: Говорят, что в былые времена в горах жили воины. В наше время, гора стала воином.
languages.name: Атлас Прайм

languages.description: かつては、山が戦士の住処とされていた。現代では、山が戦士になる。
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: W ubiegłych wiekach, mówiono o wzgórzach kryjących wojowników. W tym wieku, wzgórze przekształciło się w wojownika.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: Em épocas passadas, as montanhas abrigavam guerreiros. Já nesta era, a própria montanha se tornou o guerreiro.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: 在往事如煙的時代，據說山脈是戰士的容身之所。在這個時代，山脈已化身成戰士。
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: ในอดีตกาล ภูเขาถูกกล่าวขานว่าเป็นบ้านของนักรบ แต่ในยุคนี้ ภูเขาได้กลายเป็นนักรบไปเสียเอง
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: Eski çağlarda, dağların savaşçıları barındırdığı söylenirdi. Bu çağda ise, dağ savaşçıya dönüştü.
languages.name: Atlas Prime

languages.description: У давнину славетні воїни жили в горах. Нині ж гора сама стала воїном.
languages.name: Атлас-прайм
